name: Sarvjan Gramin Vikas Sansthan
briefDescription: Our Organisation  had organized 714 Programmes on Cutting & Tailoring,  Embridery, Painting, Beautician and Computer training centers out of which 12 are running at present in various villages of the district Gurdaspur. Our Organisation  had organized 46 Programmes on Craft Training centers for Self Help Group of SGSY under District Rural Development  .  Our organisation is running Beautician Center on the behalf of SOSVA and Cutting &Tailoring Center on the behalf of Department of Social Security and Women &Child Development. Our organizision is running the proposal of formation and Credit linkage of Self Help Groups under NABARD Schemes at District Gurdaspur & Hoshiarur.               Our organization  received  NABARD State Award Punjab
